channel.title: Twisted Metal demo
channel.description: I'm not sure how many people here have a PS3, but if you do you should definitely give this a try. I fucking love it personally. Day 1 buy. Anyone else got it? Maybe PSNs could be exchanged here for a session?

item.title: Twisted Metal demo
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Is it true that they ditched all the Twisted Metal characters and replaced them with Juggalos?
I remember seeing screenshots of a Sweet Tooth doppelganger riding around in Axel’s vehicle. I hope it was just a placeholder.

All the characters are the bosses of their own gang. I guess they did it so each vehicle could potentially have passengers for secondary fire.

So it’s like Gotham City Impostors kinda.

Read full topic
